name: react-plotly.js
description: A plotly.js react component from Plotly
author: Plotly, Inc.

scripts.make:lib: mkdirp lib && babel src --out-dir lib --ignore "src/__tests__/*.js","src/__mocks__/*.js" --presets=@babel/preset-env,@babel/preset-react --source-maps && mv lib/* ./ && rmdir lib
scripts.make:dist: mkdirp dist && browserify src/factory.js -o ./dist/create-plotly-component.js -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env @babel/preset-react ] --plugins [ @babel/plugin-proposal-class-properties ] ] -t browserify-global-shim --standalone createPlotlyComponent && uglifyjs ./dist/create-plotly-component.js --compress --mangle --output ./dist/create-plotly-component.min.js --source-map filename=dist/create-plotly-component.min.js.map
scripts.clean: rimraf lib dist react-plotly.js react-plotly.js.map factory.js factory.js.map
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run make:lib && npm run make:dist
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run deps && jest
